description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Arcade style twin stick zombie shooter.  Survive wave after wave of zombie mobs, purchase and upgrade weapons/character in between in each wave!  Local co op 1-4.
description.short: Arcade style twin stick zombie shooter.  Survive wave after wave of zombie mobs, purchase and upgrade weapons/character in between in each wave!  Local co op 1-4.
